text: Arau smarana karaa, yetiya ami tomara phale jinara eta dala anichilo. Yisakale manoyoga sahakarae kora'ana patha suni achila. Eteke yetiya te'omloke te'omra ocarata upasthita haichila, te'omloke parasparae kaichila, ‘mane mane suna’. Tara pichata yetiya kora'ana patha samapta ha’la tetiya te'omloke satarkakarairaupe nija sampradayara ocarata ubhati ga’la
